text: Dnyandeo Yashwantrao Patil (born 22 October 1935) is an Indian politician. He was Governor of Bihar state in eastern India from 29 May 2012 to 26 November 2014. He was a leader of the Indian National Congress from Maharashtra state. He was appointed as the Governor of West Bengal (additional charge). ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tripura Category:Governors of West Bengal Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Marathi people
title: D. Y. Patil
